thread.title: Ramada Eastside
thread.title_full: Ramada Eastside - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Olga n
title: Ramada Eastside
text: Would thoroughly recommend this hotel if you want to be near the heart of Manhattan and are looking for a clean and comfortable hotel. I couldn't believe how easy it was to walk to iconic New York attractions - Chrysler Building, Empire State , Rockefeller Centre, Grand Central Station...from the hotel..We stayed on bed/breakfast basis. A really good base to stay in an amazing city
